HERO_DESCRIPTION: The complete educational platform for those preparing for <highlight_concursos>public exams</highlight_concursos> and <highlight_vestibulares>university entrance exams</highlight_vestibulares>. Organize your studies, track your progress and reach your next steps.
FEATURES_HEADING: Everything you need to study smarter
FEATURES_SUBHEADING: Tools designed to optimize every step of your preparation.
FEATURE_QUESTIONS_DESC: Question bank from public and entrance exams with answer keys and detailed feedback by difficulty level.
FEATURE_AI_DESC: Essay-type questions automatically graded by artificial intelligence, with detailed feedback and improvement suggestions.
FEATURE_CONTENT_DESC: Link video lessons, handouts and materials from your favorite courses. Centralize everything in one place without leaving the platform.
FEATURE_GROUPS_DESC: Create and manage classes with different access levels. Organize activities and track student progress.
FEATURE_ACTIVITIES_DESC: Build mixed-content playlists — questions, videos, handouts — with custom ordering and deadlines.
FEATURE_EXAMS_DESC: Full mock exams with automatic grading and performance analysis by subject area.
CTA_HEADING: Ready to take the next step?
CTA_DESCRIPTION: Join students who are already organizing their studies in a smarter and more efficient way.
